ModMetaData.description:
This is where I keep minor tweaks for my own personal use. I'll try to keep the file names descriptive so you can delete files and tailor it to your liking.
Changes: 1. Variations of badge textures, added some new ones to cover more skills and military roles. 2. Increased asexual/bisexual/gay commonalities make it more realistic. 3. Inreases likelyhood of a cold snap in winter.
